article: I was loading my truck to go to the flea market when a hook on one of the bungees bent and broke back into my left eye.The _ was like a hot sword had been struck through my head.I fell down on my hands and knees, and _ I saw blood dripping onto the ground, I knew it was _ . They _ me to Erlanger Hospital in Chattanooga, where there's a special eye center.The _ there operated on me several times but couldn't save my eye.When they told me the news, I wanted to _ . Even after I got my prosthetic eye , I couldn't _ off the depression.To make matters worse, I lost my job as a transportation officer for the Tennessee Department of Children's Services because of _ about my driving ability.But one morning, I woke up and the TV was _ , and there was a 16-year-old girl.She had been _ burned on her face, hands, and legs and was learning to walk again.She _ a big smile and seemed to look right at me and said, "You can't ever give up." At that moment, I thought, this is just a (n) _ .Get over it.And I _ . It's been almost 12 years since my _ , and there isn't anything I can't do now that I used to do.Although I didn't get my _ job back, I could do something else to _ a happy life. I read a _ once where a man was feeling bad because he had no _ , until he met a man who had no feet. No matter how destroying your problem is, _ there's always someone somewhere who's worse off. _ having just one eye, I see things a lot more clearly now.
